name: mini capoeira community
notes: Worcester County. formerly of Batus Capoeira-Israel [mastre Pintor]. Ocean City, Berlin, Ocean Pines, Mystic, Oyster Harbor, Bishipville, Rehoboth Beach. free of charge. Yellow/black belt in batizado. SOURCE: email 10/16/04 (email bounced We have no current information; please contact us 12/1/11)
rawRecord:
mini capoeira community
Chorou "Matt"
formerly of        Batus Capoeira-Israel  [mastre Pintor]
Ocean City, Berlin, Ocean Pines, Mystic, Oyster Harbor, Bishipville,
Rehoboth Beach
free of charge
Capoeira Backround:
    in the end of 2002 i heard about capoeira
near my
    house  [in israel] i didnt know
what it was so i went to check it
     out....it was  AWSOME i
loved it i used to practise with 3 freinds more
     than 3 hours a day  EVERYDAY
i wouldnt/ couldnt miss out on it!! it was
     like a lifestyle to me!
i have been to 1 batizado and i used to take
     classes with "Batus Capoeira
[mastre Pintor]"
    i got a yeelow/black belt in the batizado....
SOURCE: email  10/16/04
(email bounced  We have no current information; please contact
us 12/1/11)()
